mapper.insert: INSERT INTO commission_tb ( user_id, commission_email, commission_phone, commission_title, commission_author, commission_size, purchasePrice, commission_collection, commission_etc, wishPrice ) VALUES ( "12", #{commission_email}, #{commission_phone}, #{commission_title}, #{commission_author}, #{commission_size}, #{purchasePrice}, #{commission_collection}, #{commission_etc}, #{wishPrice} )
